name: taupe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a brownish-grey colour: The colour scheme includes brown, taupe, green, and blue. My bedroom is a light shade of taupe.
/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesI don't know the difference between taupe and khaki.The painting has a tranquillizing scheme of rose, grey, and taupe. Taupe is a shade anyone can wear.

brownish-grey in colour: She was wearing a dark taupe suit. I was escorted into an elegant taupe living room.
More examplesFewer examplesA man in a taupe Toyota Corolla stops nears us.Next he brushed taupe shadow into the creases of the model's eyes.She stood hands on hips in a taupe bikini.
